<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Life in the Circus](/Articles.aspx?ID=10)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 58</row>

Running a traveling circus isn't easy, but this article provides the rules, tips, and tricks to master the show!
